story.title: The "Get Him Back" Spell - Episode 1
story.storyDescription: Sera: Deidre, I need your help.
story.creator: web-uploader

messages.text: Deidre, I need your help.
What‚Äôs wrong?
I need a spell.
What kind of spell‚Ä¶
I feel so predictable. I need a love spell üòî
Oh, boy.
Why can‚Äôt you cast it yourself? You‚Äôre in a strong coven!
I know. I‚Äôve tried, over and over, but I just can‚Äôt seem to get it to take.
You‚Äôre the most powerful witch I know.
Now you‚Äôre just buttering me up.
Aaaaand it‚Äôs working.
Thank Goddess.
So, what are we manifesting?
My boyfriend and I broke up three months ago and I‚Äôm miserable.
I need to get us back together.
Oh, the ol‚Äô ‚ÄúGet Him Back‚Äù Spell.
You know breakups are supposed to hurt, right?
Sadness doesn‚Äôt necessarily mean you should still be together.
This is different.
He feels more right than anything I‚Äôve ever known. And I wrecked it.
I know it was my fault. I own that.
How do you figure?
I was too needy. Too much. Just too, everything.
Yeah, sounds like you really messed that one up‚Ä¶
Ok, I‚Äôll help you.
You will?! Thank you so much.
Don‚Äôt thank me yet.
It‚Äôs going to take a while.
And remember, for this to work, you have to do everything I say.
I promise.
The first part is going to be tough.
The ‚ÄúGet Him Back‚Äù Spell requires total separation from the love object.
You can‚Äôt talk to him, write him, or look at his social media accounts. Can you do that?
I guess.
Do you want him back or not?
Ok, I‚Äôll do it!
Good. I‚Äôll leave the spell in my mailbox for you to pick up.
It‚Äôs in a black silk bag. Carry it everywhere you go, and whatever you do‚Äî
Don‚Äôt look inside the bag.
Let me know when you have it, k?
1 hour later
Ok, I have it.
Good. Remember, don‚Äôt look inside.
I won‚Äôt.
Ok, to activate the spell, you‚Äôll need to expose it to various elements.
First, you need to soak the bag with your tears.
You need a lot, so I recommend setting aside a few evenings this week to cry.
Turn on sad music and really go for it.
And make sure to capture the tears on the bag.
We won‚Äôt be able to get him back unless the bag is really soaked.
On it!
1 week later
Hey Deidre, I got the bag really soaked.
I cried so hard. Over and over. I‚Äôm so dehydrated.
What about the no-contact rule?
He texted me.
And?
I didn‚Äôt text back. He just wanted my Netflix password anyway.
What a prince.
Oh, he just likes to be really frugal.
He‚Äôs really into investing for the future.
I wish I could have sent him the password. But playing hard to get is really important for the spell, right?
Crucial.
Ok, what‚Äôs my task this week?
You need to expose the spell to the smoke of regrets.
Take a piece of paper and write down everything you think you screwed up in the relationship.
You mean the things I KNOW I screwed up?
Ok, sure. Write all that down.
Then take it down to the beach and light it on fire.
Hold the bag over the smoke.
When you‚Äôre done, bury a little bit of the ash on the beach, and let the wind carry the rest away.
All the while, be sure you chant ‚ÄúI‚Äôm free. I‚Äôm free. I‚Äôm free.‚Äù
But I don‚Äôt want to be free. I want to be with him.
Oh, don‚Äôt worry ‚Äî independence is very sexy.
It‚Äôll create the space for him to come back.
Ohhhh, I get it. He always said I crowded him.
This will just send him the vibe that I‚Äôm never going to be clingy again.
You got it!
1 week later
I did it, Deidre! It felt kind of‚Ä¶
Freeing?
I mean, I guess. More like, I really examined all my mistakes and now I definitely won‚Äôt make them again!
Sure.
So what‚Äôs next?
We need to expose the bag to a lot of positive energy.
We want to create a magnetic force field that will draw him back to you.
I like the sound of that!
The spell needs to be exposed to the Laughter of Friends for several hours.
It can get a bit diffused if you try and do it in a restaurant or bar. The best thing to do is to throw a party.
And not invite him?
And not invite him.
Ok‚Ä¶üòî
1 week later
Deidre! It‚Äôs really working!
He saw all my friends posting about the party and he texted me all night.
He wants to meet me to talk.
And what was your response?
Nothing! There‚Äôs no way I‚Äôm giving up on the spell now.
Good girl. If you cave in now, the results might be only temporary.
You want him back for good, right?
I sure do. Ok, what‚Äôs next?
Next, you need to expose the spell to your romantic soul.
Take the bag shopping for a spectacular new outfit.
Get a manicure and a pedicure, and then take it out dancing.
Do anything you can to make yourself feel amazing.
The better you feel, the stronger the magnetic pull that draws him back in.
Woah, this step sounds great!
BTW, he‚Äôs texting me all the time.
In fact, he‚Äôs starting to sound a little desperate‚Ä¶
Right on track for week three!
üëç
1 week later
I feel amazing!
That‚Äôs just what we like to see in week four.
In fact, I think the spell is close to complete.
You mean, I can finally respond to all his texts?
Let me know how it goes.
üôÇ üôÇ üôÇ
3 days later
Well?
It was okay, I guess?
He invited me out and we split the bill‚Ä¶
And he even stuck me with the tax and the tip!
I thought you liked how frugal he is.
I do. And I guess I still love him but‚Ä¶
But?
Well, I haven‚Äôt seen him in six weeks and he didn‚Äôt ask me one single thing about myself.
Interesting. Did he want to get back together?
He wanted to hook up.
He said we could ‚Äútalk about‚Äù seeing each other again‚Ä¶
But he wants to date other people too.
What did you say?
I said I‚Äôd think about it. I guess the spell didn‚Äôt work.
Why do you say that?
Well, for one, I didn‚Äôt really get him back. And‚Ä¶
And?
I‚Äôm not sure I care.
I just don‚Äôt feel as good around him as I do with my friends.
Or even just by myself.
And if he were really the one for me, wouldn‚Äôt he have stuck around, to try and work it out?
Maybe so.
I guess the spell just didn‚Äôt work.
Anyway, thanks for trying. I‚Äôm sure your other spells are really great.
Oh, well, you win some, you lose some. üòâ ‚ú®
